articles.title: What You Need to Know Ahead of Synchrony Financial's Earnings Release
articles.mainIdea: What You Need to Know Ahead of Synchrony Financial's Earnings Release
articles.summary: Barchart: What You Need to Know Ahead of Synchrony Financial's Earnings Release. Synchrony Financial will release its fourth-quarter earnings soon, and analysts anticipate a single-digit bottom-line growth.

articles.title: 1 Value Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Headwinds
articles.mainIdea: 1 Value Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Headwinds
articles.summary: StockStory: 1 Value Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 Facing Headwinds. Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues. Related tickers mentioned: FA, SYF-PB, TOL.

articles.title: SYF: Raising target price to $96.00
articles.summary: Argus Research: SYF: Raising target price to $96.00. SYNCHRONY FINANCIAL has an Investment Rating of BUY; a target price of $96.000000; an Industry Subrating of High; a Management Subrating of Medium; a Safety Subrating of High; a Financial Strength Subrating of High; a Growth Subrating of Medium; and a Value Subrating of High. Related tickers mentioned: SYF-PB.
